body_html: TensorFlow will automatically allocate all the GPUs' memory when it starts. While a TensorFlow is running, the nvidia-smi command should show this. But, only the first GPU (in your case, the 1080 Ti) will be used by default. TensorFlow does not automatically place ops on different GPUs so you need to use tf.device(...) if you want to use the GTX Titan.
